original_title: Timeline: The History of ECW- 1994- As Told by Shane Doughlas
overview: The ongoing history of wrestling's most dangerous and innovative organization in recent times, rolls on! This edition is very special as we tackle the beginning of ECW's "hardcore era," as Eastern became Extreme. This 1994 edition is told by the man that was at the center of that transition, as he grabbed a mic, threw down a belt, and changed wrestling history.
title: Timeline: The History of ECW- 1994- As Told by Shane Doughlas
